lines.text: I come in peace.
And you go in pieces, asshole.
[after blowing away the police chief, who was trying to kill his partner]

[to Laurence Smith]
Never trust nobody; Caine Manual, Chapter 1, Page 1.

[trying on a jacket from Jack's closet]
Hey, it fits perfectly!
It should... it was mine when I was 12.
You've been gone eight days, Jack. A week I could understand, but EIGHT FUCKING DAYS!

[studying the disc weapon]
The human body carries a small electrical charge, right? You tune the disc to the charge and then...
[makes a slashing motion across his throat]
Flathead's basically right. S'like turning your radio dial to K-I-L-L.
Either you're Santa Claus or you're dead, pal.
[repeated line]
I come in peace.
Fuck you, spaceman!

[while being chased by the White Boys, Larry produces a huge firearm, which resembles a cannon more than a gun]
What the hell is that?
A Christmas present from my mother.

[at the murder scene, Larry and Jack are nearly decapitated by the alien disc]
Now, that's a murder weapon.
No shit, Man, he had to be at least seven feet tall. I saw him about two blocks down the street.
Yeah, sure you did. Last week he saw Jimi Hendrix at the laundrymat, remember that?
Right, with a dryer full of tie-dyed shirts.
